text: Pedro Bettencourt (born 18 November 1994) is a Portugal rugby union player. His usual position is as a centre, and he currently plays for Newcastle Falcons. ==References== ==External links== *itsrugby.co.uk Profile Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese rugby union players Category:Portugal international rugby union players Category:Rugby union centres
title: Pedro Bettencourt
